analysisEngineMetaData.name: POS Density Feature: Modal
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
Calculates modal verb density of the text. Modal verbs include for English: the Penn Treebank tags MD, for German: the Tiger tags VMFIN VMINF VMPP, for Italian: VMip VMip3 VMii VMii3 VMis VMis3 VMif VMif3 VMcp VMcp3 VMci VMci3 VMdp VMdp3 VMg VMp VMf VMm
Formula: modalDensity = numModal / numTokens
AAE dependency: SentenceAnnotator.xml TokenAnnotator.xml NTokenFeature.xml POSAnnotator.xml

configurationParameter.name: POSTypeEN
configurationParameter.description: options: lexical lexical pos: n, v, adj, and adv functional non-lexical pos conjunction CC, IN determiner PDT, DT adjective JJ, JJR, JJS noun NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS pronoun PRP, PRP$, WP, WP$ adverb RB, RBR, RBS, WRB verb VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, VBZ CD EX FW LS MD POS RP SYM TO UH space separated multiple types are also allowed, e.g. "JJ NN WP"

configurationParameter.name: POSTypeDE
configurationParameter.description: options: Tiger POS tags or predefined collections for: lexical word types, functional words, and lexical and functional words
